list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a book forming part of a work or series.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a biography of George Bernard Shaw in three volumes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tiểu sử của George Bernard Shaw trong ba tập

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the amount of space that a substance or object occupies, or that is enclosed within a container, especially when great.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the sewer could not cope with the volume of rainwater
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cống thoát nước không thể đối phó với khối lượng nước mưa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: quantity or power of sound; degree of loudness.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he turned the volume up on the radio
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta biến âm lượng lên radio
